extendedInfo.description: SchoolDude University is the annual training and development conference for SchoolDude clients. More than 1,000 professionals gather to trade industry best practices for continued excellence in management of educational institutions. For 11 years, educational professionals have taken home applicable insight and knowledge to save money, improve efficiency and increase productivity at your institution.For the past 13 years, SchoolDude has served as the market leader in education enterprise asset management, delivering Software-as-a-solution applications to help both small and large institutions better manage their facilities, IT and business operations. More than 1 million education professionals from more than 6,000 educational institutions are using SchoolDude products to streamline maintenance work order and IT help desk management, schedule preventive maintenance and plan for capital replacements,  increase inventory accountability, maximize after-hours facility use and utility consumption. We help clients stretch budgets by managing support services effectively and efficiently, making a difference by helping institutions improve and enhance the in the teaching and learning environment. For more information, visit www.schooldude.com
